test

Class PillarTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.PillarTest

  • public class PillarTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests the Pillar class used in the DocJones algorithm
    Author:
    Harry Nelken (hrn10@case.edu) For EECS 293 - Vincenzo Liberatore Software Craftsmanship
